content: more stitches per 10cm/4″ your socks will be smaller than indicated and if your gauge is looser less stitches per 10cm/4″ your socks will be bigger than indicated the pattern is designed for a gauge of 23 stitches and 26 row/10cm 4″ using two colours and 22 stitches and 29 row/10cm 4″ using one colour abbreviations p purl k knit ssk slip slip knit decrease slip two stitches knitwise individually then knit them together ​ through the back loop © karola rehnström 2021 all rights reserved - for personal use only version 1 1 20210131 page 2 of 5 #generationssocks instructions cuff cast on 56 stitches using the main colour divide the stitches on needles 1-2-3-4 as follows 15-13-13-15 i e 15 stitches on the first needle 13 stitches on the second and third needle and 15 stitches on the fourth needle join the round ensuring not to twist the stitches when joining the end of the row is at the end of needle 4 work the cuff according to row 1-11 of chart a note that the pattern is read from bottom to top right to left if you prefer a written explanation of row 1-11 of chart a read on for a row by row explanation a left leaning twist needed on row 3 6 and 9 is worked as follows slip 1 onto ​ a cable needle hold in front knit 1 knit 1 from the cable needle row 1 needle 1 - purl p 1 knit k 2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 row 1 needle 2 - p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 row 1 needle 3 - p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 row 1 needle 4 - k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p2 k2 p1 row 2 repeat row 1 row 3 p1 *left leaning twist over 2 knit stitches p2* repeat *-* 12 more times there ​ ​ ​ ​ are now 3 stitches remaining on needle 4 work one more left leaning twist p1 row 4 repeat row 1 row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 3 row 7 repeat row 1 row 8 repeat row 1 row 9 repeat row 3 row 10 repeat row 1 ​ row 11 repeat row 1 ​ note you can modify the cuff by omitting the left leaning twist and work a basic k2 p2 cuff instead in that case follow the instructions for row 1 for all 11 row of the cuff leg knit row 12 of chart a in the main colour increase one stitch on needle 1 and one stitch on needle 4 increase by picking up the yarn between two stitches and knit it through the back loop there are 16-13-13-16 58 stitches on the needles introduce the contrast colour and work the leg following row 13-49 of chart a note the decreases on row 26 32 42 work the decreases as follows on needle 1 knit the first stitch according to the chart knit
